page.title: 10EAGLESFIELD & DISTRICT GALA
page.content: For fifty years at the beginning of this century the village had its own Eaglesfield Show on the first Saturday in September. As with many other small {agricultural shows}this one gradually petered out as more people got cars enabling travel to the towns for shopping and more sophisticated forms of{entertainment. In 1972 the Eaglesfield & District Playing Field Association saw the culmination of five years of fund-raising with the opening of the {Playing Field,}which provided the village with a football pitch and childrens swings and chute(slide). The fancy dress parade and sports held that day became an annual event. Within a few years a Gala committee was formed to take over the running of these events, and the{festivities}were extended to become the present Gala.
